rukus.text: 40|10|Niscaya yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamtaka ucca kanthata koraa ha’ba, ‘tomalokara nijara prati (aji) tomalokara yimana ksobha haiche, allahara ksobha iyatakaiyo danara achila, yetiya tomalokaka imanara prati ahbana karaa haichila kintu tomaloke seya asbikara karaichila’.

40|11|Sihamte ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Tumi amaka dubara mrtyu pradana karaicha arau dubara amaka jirana dana karaicha. Seye ami amara aparaadha sbikara karaicho. Eteke (jahannamara paraa) oloraara kono upaya ache neki’

40|12|(Sihamtaka koraa ha’ba) ‘e'ito e'i babe ye, yetiya allahaka ekakabharae ahbana karaa haichila tetiya tomaloke kupharai karaichila, arau yetiya te'omra lagata sbirka karaa haichila tetiya tomaloke seya bisbasa karaichila. Eteke yaratiya kartrtba kerala su'ucca, mahana allaharae'i’.
40|13|Teraemi tomalokaka te'omra nidarsanarali dekhuraaya arau akasara paraa tomalokara babe jiraika aratirna karae. Seye upadesa kerala se'i byaktihe grahana karae yiye allaha abhimukhi.
40|14|Eteke tomaloke kerala allahake'i ahbana karaa te'omra anugatyata ekanistha hai. Yadi'o kaphirasakale apachanda karae.

40|15|Te'om su'ucca maryadara adhikarai, arachara adhipati, teraemi nija bandasakalara majata yara prati iccha te'omra adesara paraa ahi praerana karae, yate te'om maha sanmilana dirasa samparke satarka karaiba parae.
40|16|Yidina sihamte (manuha bilaka) prakasita ha’ba se'idina allahara ocarata ekorae'i gopana nathakiba. (Te'om ka’ba) ‘aji kartrtba kara’? Kerala allaharae'i, te'om ejana, prabala pratapasali.
40|17|Aji pratyekake tara arjana anusarae pratiphala diya ha’ba, aji kono an'yaya karaa naha’ba. Niscaya allaha drauta hicapa grahanakarai.

40|18|Arau tumi sihamtaka satarka karai diya asanna dina samparke; yetiya duhkha-kasta sambarana arasthata sihamtara praana kanthagata ha’ba. Yalimasakalara babe kono antaranga bandhu na'i arau ene kono madhyasthatakarai'o na'i yara madhyasthata grahana karaa ha’ba.
40|19|Cakusamuhara bisbasaghatakata arau antarasamuhe yi gopana karae seya te'om jane.
40|20|Allahe yathayathabharae phayacala karae, arau allahara paraibarte sihamte yiboraka ahbana karae sihamte ekorae'i phayacala karaiba noraarae. Niscaya allaha, teraemi sarbasraota, sarbadrasta.
